comment: Please do not use derogatory racial slurs.
amr:

comment: I can't tell you enough how unacceptable that language is. You can put people down without being racist.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (t / tell-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :degree-of (p2 / possible-01

                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (l / language
                                          :mod (t3 / that)))))
                  :ARG2 (y / you)

      :snt2 (p3 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (p4 / put-01
                  :ARG0 y)
            :ARG1 (p5 / person)
            :ARG2 (d / down)

comment: Please avoid using language that degrades people because of their race or gender.
